item.title: Conditionally skipping a trigger job in GitLab based on a previous job
item.description: In this post I describe the approaches I explored to conditionally skip a trigger job in GitLab based on a previous job using dynamic pipelines Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/conditionally-skipping-a-trigger-job-in-gitlab-based-on-a-previous-job/
